website_summaries.verdict: A modern chandelier for tighter, smaller spaces around the home or apartment. Great way to add some visual interest without taking up too much room.
pros: Extra secure attachment and mounting brackets keeps the chandelier from swaying near ceiling fans and vents
cons: Less uniform illumination than more traditional chandeliers

customer_reviews.title: The finished product is amazing and definitely worth the hard work of putting it ...
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is amazing and definitely worth the hard work of putting it together but, the assembly was extremely time consuming and difficult. The item came with directions that were completely wrong and of no use. You literally have to put the entire thing together from scratch including the wiring. Luckily my husband has some knowledge of wiring and was able to figure it out but it took more than a few hours. He did find a youtube video demonstrating how to put it together but it was in Chinese so only moderately helpful. Like I said, it looks great but it is not a quick assembly product and requires a bit of electrical knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my time-traveling office!
customer_reviews.text: These were *exactly* the lights I wanted, and I adore them! Yes, it took a bit of assembly but the sellers sent me a link to a video to watch and that made it pretty straightforward to put them together. Just make sure you have your tools on hand and about a half hour per light, and be patient. But it's not a very complicated assembly if you take your time. The only wish I have is that they'd send some 6" rods along with the 12" rods so I could have a bit more control over hang-length. Don't forget you also have to buy a dozen bulbs per light, so that adds some cost, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Susan West

customer_reviews.title: This light looks great and appears to be well-made
customer_reviews.text: This light looks great and appears to be well-made. My only complaint is that it was a pain to put together. The price was low enough that I understand why you would need to put it together yourself but the directions were really confusing and hard to follow. It took about 1.5 hours just to get it together and then hanging it took another 20 minutes. My husband is a contractor and has hung plenty of our chandeliers in the past and said this was the most frustrating. I think if the instructions were written more clearly it may not have been such an issue. Otherwise, the light itself looks nice once it's up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are almost as if they don’t belong to this piece. Maybe if you’re a professional electrician, & u don’t need instructions- this is for u. But I’m learning as I’m going- & this tiny piece of paper that is supposed to tell me how to assemble is not good enough. Nope. Even the assembly parts list isn’t accurate. I’m sure once I figure it out, it will be fine- but I’m very frustrated. & disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BKNY

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this light fixture! I had hoped I could assemble it myself. I got to a point on my iwn and gave up. The directions are not detailed and although there are tutorials on youtube, I couldn't complete assrmbly on my own. But after installation, in my tall, sloped ceiling (an adapter is included for slope) - I am super happy! It doesn't come with lightbulbs though!
customer_reviews.author: geraly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Instructions!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who wrote the instructions for this? Mr. Magoo. Jeez. I am glad I have some knowledge of how to assemble things and electricity, cause otherwise I would never be able to do this following the instructions that came with it. Quality of the product is just OK. Made in China so it is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: volatex

customer_reviews.title: This light fixture did no disappoint! It looks great above our staircase
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture did no disappoint! It looks great above our staircase. We had it professionally installed by my husband had no trouble pre assembling it. The color is a very coppery gold. Matte, not shiny, not brassy. It matches another arc floor lamp we purchased recently. It gives off a ton of light so we ill install a dimmer and it will look even better as we control how much light we want. It gives a fantastic modern spin and is definitely a cool statement piece for our new modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Donna-b

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. The metal is a bit soft so you ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The metal is a bit soft so you have to be careful when putting it together not to damage the sphere.
customer_reviews.author: Ananda

customer_reviews.title: which is a perfect match for my new modern home
customer_reviews.text: This is a very contemporary chandelier, which is a perfect match for my new modern home. The high quality material, pretty appearance, simple design and reasonable price make this a good choice. The It cost round 30minutes to assemble all parts and another 30 minutes to install the light. I will highly recommend you follow the video instruction and each step is very clear. When the light got hung in my lobby, it is so amazing and definitely exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Renee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price. I just bought my first house and didn’t want to spend money renovating it. I focused on changing small things like fixtures/lights/knobs $ furnishes it very modern chic. Looks fantastic and this chandelier made such a difference for such a small price
customer_reviews.author: alena summ

customer_reviews.title: But it looks amazing! And for the price
customer_reviews.text: A pain to put together (makes sure you have wire nuts big enough to put 12 white wires together) it took me about an hour and a half to assemble. But it looks amazing! And for the price, it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sawtelly

customer_reviews.title: I’m incredibly pleased with this light
customer_reviews.text: As far as looks, I’m incredibly pleased with this light. However, like other people have said, assembly is tough. My boyfriend is an electrician, and it took HIM an hour to put everything together and install the fixture. If you aren’t handy, factor in the cost of professional installation before purchasing. But it is beautiful and a good value overall for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Comes in many pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Comes in many pieces. Will have to completely wire each arm of the chandelier. There are other brands that come wired for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Chandelier was a little tricky to put together. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Chandelier was a little tricky to put together. I would not suggest doing this alone or if you have arthritis. The included instructions were not very helpful. If you aren't familiar with assembling a wired-fixture. I would pass on this item.
customer_reviews.author: A. Welter

customer_reviews.title: Drop dead gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous!!! The instructional video was very helpful, but I personally did not put it together. My dad who has a little bit of wiring experience found it fairly easy to do. It looks absolutely amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Delozier

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Okay so we love the chandelier, but mannn was it hard to assemble. I'm pretty handy and it took me a hour or two to put together. The directions literally didn't make sense and I'm hoping my house doesn't burn down as a result of my electrical work. On another note, it's very sturdy and seems like good product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a fully assembled light fixture. This thing is in a million pieces and the way the bars have to be screwed into the tiny little ball, unless you have the tiny hands of a raccoon or Donald Trump, you are not going to get this thing assembled. Very disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: AquaGirl07

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: husband installed after 2 hours of building it, it didn't work so we paid electrician to come thinking he missed something and it still didn't work, now im out the $ for electrician, and no light.... DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! THIS! LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic showcase piece in our stairwell. Easy to instal if you follow the video instructions. VERY happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lee B

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with how it turned out
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with how it turned out, but took many hours to install and get around the erroneous instructions/some missing hardware.
customer_reviews.author: O.M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Bold and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool light fixture! It is bigger than I thought, so it makes even more of a statement than I thought. It doesn't come with light bulbs, we tried a couple of different kinds, which each gave it a bit of a different look.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing! Way nicer than I had anticipated because of how reasonable the price was. HIGHLY recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a good price but I would have rather spent the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this light but was shocked when it arrived in a box about the size of a shoe box. The directions were very vague and hard to follow. After about an hour of trying to stuff my hand in the center ball to attach the arms I gave up and decided it wasn't worth the trouble. It was a good price but I would have rather spent the extra money to have it arrive pre-assembled. Also the final measurements were only available on the website and not anywhere in the directions or packaging. Sadly this product will be returned
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Oreskovich

customer_reviews.title: The sputnik look is cool in a dining room I did in a rehab
customer_reviews.text: With the bulbs I bought for this, it got more costly. The sputnik look is cool in a dining room I did in a rehab.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Kominsky

customer_reviews.title: Looks great !!
customer_reviews.text: Not very hard to assemble but lacks instuctions. Could make it easier by combining all wires in 2-3 groups instead on connecting them all together. Lightbulb holders are not good quality.. bulbs always seem a little loose (even the ones that are recommended). Overall great.. Really looks nice with flament LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: Parag Bhide

customer_reviews.title: No proper instructions,  quality control terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was missing connection parts, the instructions were awful, no numbers, etc. I haven't posted this before now as we were remodeling. Got ready to install the light and wires weren't long enough to attach. I am very disappointed as this was a gift for my aunt.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Noblitt

customer_reviews.title: Order came without instructions but looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because my package arrived without any instructions and reading that it's a pain to put together to begin with doesn't make me too excited so that's a bummer BUT I think the light will be absolutely beautiful in our entryway (if we can figure it out)! UPDATE: Hubby put it together in about 2 hours and then installing it was another 30 minutes with my dad helping him but it looks so so good!
customer_reviews.author: Shalli Aldred

customer_reviews.title: That's Absolutely great product, and good deal too
customer_reviews.text: That's Absolutely great product, and good deal too. I found similar one in the store which is expensive. I like this style is elegant, not too much but simple, you can do it in livingroom or bedroom all fits. The quality so far is good I haven't find any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Xing Lin

customer_reviews.title: The sputnik
customer_reviews.text: looks good and works but man oh man make sure you have two people or a professional install it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex  Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! It was easy to assemble, especially after watching the video and all the pieces were included to wire it up. I was unsure if it was going to be long enough for our 10.5 foot ceilings but with 4 rods included it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McCoy

customer_reviews.title: but looks fantastic! Love this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Total pain to assemble, but looks fantastic! Love this light fixture!

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier looks good on my dinning room. The only complaint I got is that is pain to put it together.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s great! It was a bit tricky to put together, but I’m handy so I managed. It was a 3-4 hour total install. It’s exactly what I was looking for at half the price! I got LED bulbs from Home Depot and you can see it from space, it’s so bright! So I just put it on a dimmer and it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product arrived promptly. Takes a little time and patience to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: It took a good hour to assemble but it was worth it. I have LED bulbs but may have to put a dimmer on the switch - It's bright.

customer_reviews.title: 3 Electricians/Handy men Could Not Install
customer_reviews.text: The product is not safe and the directions do not match what was received. I had three handymen and electricians attempt to install this light with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Eam

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to Install
customer_reviews.text: The box came with all the wrong parts- it was a 15 light globe but I ordered the 12 globe chandelier. There are a lot of wires and it’s not easy to put together and then realize they sent you the wrong products!
customer_reviews.author: IGBC Team

customer_reviews.title: Price was great and lite is great!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this lite in magazines and the price was great and got exactly what I wanted. Thanks

customer_reviews.text: instructions stink and so does the video. An electrician did it for me, so it was still worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this product but it is AWFUL to put together.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, a complete headache as well.
customer_reviews.text: Product is awful. My husband spent hours assembling it and the instructions were incorrect, so many random pieces that aren’t right, just a total and complete mess and waste of our day. Does not work. Waste of money, going in the trash. Save yourself, DONT BUY

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous. A lot of work.
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together would help if you're an electrician with patience. Beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! It's a challenge to put it together if ...

customer_reviews.title: Buy this light!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light!! It was kind of difficult to put together but worth it once you do. I get so many compliments on this light and it costs a lot less than Home Depot or Lowe’s.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It s pain to put together, but when its together, you're guests will LOVE IT. Wish they sold the light bulbs with it as a combo though.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and really easy to install. Super happy with our purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible for the average person to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're an electrician I wouldn't recommend this light. It's impossible for the average person to assemble. Plan on paying someone to do it for you.

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and everyone that walks in says
customer_reviews.text: The installation wasn't hard at all and I have no experience with these things. It looks great and everyone that walks in says, "Wow!"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: looks great, not hard to put together just is time ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, looks great, not hard to put together just is time consuming because there is so many wires. Really goes with my 1950's house.

customer_reviews.title: I like the way the fixture looks once we got it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the fixture looks once we got it up and working but putting it together was difficult and the directions provided in the box were not helpful at all.

customer_reviews.title: love it, got it for the dining
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, love it, got it for the dining room
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Really bad instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and looks good. It takes a fair amount of effort to assemble.'All of the light rod are separate from the center ball. Each one has to be inserted and attached with a nut from inside the ball. Each rod has its own black and white wires. ALL black wires have to be connected and ALL white wire connected. Then each giant bundle has to be connected to the main black and white that comes down the top rod. Buy some larger electrical connectors to make this easier and a more secure connection. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the instructions are really bad.
customer_reviews.author: april welsh

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks amazing! I got the Sputnik with chrome finish and I love it. Takes some time to put together but well worth it. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: but beautiful once
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky to put together, but beautiful once installed

customer_reviews.title: Final product looks nice. Came in quite a few pieces and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Final product looks nice. Came in quite a few pieces and had to be assembled. It was a little hard to stuff all of the wires through the housing unit.

customer_reviews.title: Wiring nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Does not come pre wired and it’s an absolute nightmare to wire up. Returning.

customer_reviews.title: You better be handy

customer_reviews.title: This chandelier is gorgeous, once we installed it. ...
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is gorgeous, once we installed it. Installing it was a whole other situation. We were sent an email from the seller with a video to help with installation that we didn't see until later but we watched it and it's just very complicated! We did it, though! And, for this price, it was worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Did not like. It was difficult to put together and was missing parts. No instructions with product. I had to You Tube instructions to put this light fixture together. I only wish that I would've been able to put it together Easley that there were no parts missing because I truly loved the light fixture I needed this for my mid century decoration. Unfortunately it did not work out so I had to send it back .

customer_reviews.title: It looks cool but save your money and go with something else

product_meta.title: Sputnik Chandeliers 12 Lights Black Pendant Lighting Ceiling Mount Light Fixture, UL Listed
feature_bullets: Retro Home Decoration - Black sputnik chandelier meets classic European design, shines brightly with 12 Lights
Adjustable Height Fixture - Includes 4 hanging rods (32-inch) makes 25.6-inch wide x 45.8-inch high in total
Adapt to Flat & Slope Ceiling - Comes with ceiling adapter, you can install this pendant light on either flat or slope ceiling
Safety US Electric Certified - UL LISTED meets American standard. 110V-120V, E26/E27(40-watt max), bulbs are sold separately. Compatible with LED, incandescent, CFL and halogen bulbs

Applicable in Different Places - Perfect for living room, bars, hotel or restaurant. Please check Related Video Shorts about installation or click the link (https://www.youtu be.com/watch?v=ZUUckYFxpxw&t=126s) (Please delete the blank between "youtu" and "be".)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
